explains: n. 自动扶梯，电动扶梯

sentences.en: I pushed through the crowds and on to the escalator.
sentences.cn: 我挤过人群，上了自动扶梯。

sentences.en: Take the escalator to the third floor and it's the last office on the left.
sentences.cn: 乘电梯到4楼，左边最后的那个办公室就是。

sentences.en: But today, the escalator is jammed at the top.
sentences.cn: 但是今天，电梯堵在了顶楼。
